Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.view.gui

Class Scenes

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.view.gui.Scenes
public class Scenes extends Object
The Scenes class represents a JavaFX scene and its associated controller.
